title: FS: raw Cy young T206 Glove shows
author: npa589

posts.post_title: FS: raw Cy young T206 Glove shows
posts.post_content:
Looks great, and is in GOOD condition. Light Corner creases and a wrinkle, but still presents very well. Was planning to send to sgc, but seeing if someone wants a raw copy instead first.

$1750 takes it via PayPal Ff
